channel.title: Axum on Momori Nakano
channel.description: Recent content in Axum on Momori Nakano

item.title: Step-by-Step Guide to Building a WebSocket Chat App with Axum and React
item.description: In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of creating a full-stack chat app using WebSocket. Our backend will be built with Axum, a powerful Rust backend framework, and Shuttle, a development platform, while the frontend will be developed using React and Vite. We’ll cover Utilizing WebSocket in Axum and React. Generating unique identifiers using nanoid. Incorporating telemetry with tracing for enhanced logging. You can find the complete code for this project on GitHub.
